wats the ocbc rate now? i m not tune for refinancing right now  but good to know more

Promotion rates like for example.Fix rate 2 years is 1.2%Fix rate 3 years is 1.3%Mortgage board rate ( bank floating rate ) estimated at 1.18%1m comp Sora + 0.98%This is just a brief summary of rates.All these rates are indicative and subjected to change from time to time.
Of course case by case basis I can also see what can be done (:
thanks for sharing. i still got abt $495k loan with DBS FHRforgot when due for refinancing.. probably not soon
You can call dbs and ask (: essentially when you're approximately 5 to 6 months before the end of your lock in period you can look around and sign the package

Interest rates are really low now. And why 5 to 6 months before lock in end is cause letter of offer validity is for 6 months. So immediately when you're after lock in  you'll be out of the bank and into another bank (:
